name: Sliding Walls
description:
All design and gameplay will make you lost and found. For ever. For real. 

Get lost in a dynamic labyrinth: find the keys, find the locks and use them to shape the labyrinth so you can find something else elsewhere. 

How to play: WASD to move, mouse to look around.
Use R,G,B,P to use keys on their locks.

Credits:
Coding: Giovanni Lucio Colì
Game and Level Design, coding: Simona Maiorano
Splash Scren Art: Giuseppe Longo aka Misbug
